CustomField.description: If set, the batch job will be scheduled to run repeatedly with the supplied frequency (in minutes). The job only needs to be submitted once and takes care of rescheduling itself.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If set, the batch job will be scheduled to run repeatedly with the supplied frequency (in minutes). The job only needs to be submitted once and takes care of rescheduling itself.
CustomField.label: Batch Interval
